issues.description: This contract executes a message call to to another contract. Make sure that the called contract is trusted and does not execute user-supplied code.
issues.title: Message call to external contract

issues.description:
Multiple sends exist in one transaction, try to isolate each external call into its own transaction. As external calls can fail accidentally or deliberately.
Consecutive calls: 
Call at address: 3316
issues.title: Multiple Calls

issues.description: This contract executes a message call to to another contract. Make sure that the called contract is trusted and does not execute user-supplied code.

issues.description: A possible transaction order independence vulnerability exists in function dismantleCubegon(uint256). The value or direction of the call statement is determined from a tainted storage location
issues.title: Transaction order dependence

issues.description: The return value of an external call is not checked. Note that execution continue even if the called contract throws.
issues.title: Unchecked CALL return value
